me.title: Who it's me?
me.its-me:
Hello! I’m a front-end developer focused on creating modern, accessible, and visually appealing interfaces. I work with React.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS, building fast and responsive applications. 

I have experience in developing dynamic interfaces and solving problems. I enjoy turning ideas into efficient solutions, writing clean and maintainable code, and paying close attention to detail. 

I’m always learning new technologies and looking to improve my skills to deliver high-quality projects.
projects.title: Projects
projects.description-project1:
The Apple Website Clone is a personal project developed to improve my skills in React.js. 
In this project, I aimed to recreate elements of Apple's interface, exploring reusable components, state management, front-end best practices, and responsive components.
projects.description-project2:
Jasmine's Juices is a fictional e-commerce created to study Next.js and TailwindCSS. 
The focus of this project was to learn optimized rendering, responsive components, and modern styling with Tailwind, simulating the visual structure of a real online store.
projects.description-project3:
A complete to-do list application with support for multiple custom lists. 
It allows you to create lists, add tasks, mark them as completed, filter by status, and delete items or entire lists. The project was developed to practice logic, state management, structuring interactive applications, and building responsive components.
all-projects.title: Projects
all-description-project1:
The Apple Website Clone is a personal project developed to improve my skills in React.js. 
In this project, I aimed to recreate elements of Apple's interface, exploring reusable components, state management, front-end best practices, and responsive components.
all-description-project2:
Jasmine's Juices is a fictional e-commerce created to study Next.js and TailwindCSS. 
The focus of this project was to learn optimized rendering, responsive components, and modern styling with Tailwind, simulating the visual structure of a real online store.
all-description-project3:
A complete to-do list application with support for multiple custom lists. 
It allows you to create lists, add tasks, mark them as completed, filter by status, and delete items or entire lists. The project was developed to practice logic, state management, structuring interactive applications, and building responsive components.
all-description-project4: A link aggregator developed as a digital business card, allowing you to organize and centralize your main contacts and social networks in one place.
all-description-project5: A simple general knowledge quiz featuring animated score display, automatic page scrolling, and a popup to restart the game. The project was developed to practice logic, JavaScript, and command-based interactions.
